gold_translation: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
gold_transcript: Mais ces plans sont devenus obsolètes presque du jour au lendemain, quand plus de 800 000 soldats de l’Armée rouge de l’Union soviétique sont arrivés et ont créé le front biélorusse et ukrainien après avoir envahi les régions est de la Pologne, violant ainsi le Traité de Paix de Riga, le pacte de non-agression soviéto-polonais, ainsi que d’autres traités internationaux, qu’ils soient bilatéraux ou multilatéraux.

whisper_l_ft: leur comportement thermique n'est pas aussi stable que celui des grandes grottes de la planète qui maintiennent une température constante mais ils se ressemblent en ce qu'ils sont des trous profonds dans la terreselon glenn kushing membre de l'équipage de l'usgs centre américain des études géologiques et du personnel de l'université d'arizona du nord situé à flasgdorf en arizona
nllb_translation: Their thermal behavior is not as stable as that of the great caves on the planet that maintain a constant temperature but they are similar in that they are deep holes in the earthelon glenn kushing a crew member of the usgs center for geological studies and staff of northern arizona university located in flasgdorf arizona
gold_translation: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.

gold_translation: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
